volunteer_experiences:
[{'date': {'start': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}, 'end': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}}, 'role': 'PTNL ondernemingsraad (Staff Council) member', 'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'Shell', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D0BAQGN30g7aSl4NA/company-logo_400_400/0/1519856218579?e=1700092800&v=beta&t=HqIwwLBNmVKkXXiXnFVRbQwTX34PBz5TB2QZhtR3btU', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/shell/'}, 'cause': 'CIVIL_RIGHTS', 'description': 'Elected member of the Shell Projects & Technology NL Ondernemingsraad (staff council). Active participation in the Health, Safety and wellbeing as well as the communication sub committees. Focal point of the Moves working group interfacing the business and P&T staff.
As a staff council member my  key role is to work as one team with other members to ensure that  in a continuously changing environment, the wellbeing of the business and staff is secured through an approachable and trusted staff council. We work hard to be inclusive, respectful, cooperative,  diplomatic, whilst keeping our constituency well informed through being open, visible and pro-active. We work together with the Shell P&T NL Bestuurder (Governor) in a manner that is cooperative and professional on both negotiations and advice. We maintain a good relationship with the Shell NL Central Staff Council (COR) and the Shell European Works Council (SEWC), strongly aligned on key consultation subjects.'}, {'date': {'start': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}, 'end': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}}, 'role': 'Young Shell Rijswijk Social Committee Chair', 'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'Shell', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D0BAQGN30g7aSl4NA/company-logo_400_400/0/1519856218579?e=1700092800&v=beta&t=HqIwwLBNmVKkXXiXnFVRbQwTX34PBz5TB2QZhtR3btU', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/shell/'}, 'cause': 'SCIENCE_AND_TECHNOLOGY', 'description': 'As chair of Young Shell Rijswijk Social Committee I served as  ambassador for the Young Shell network regarding its reputation, vision, planning and budget in order to meet the D&I targets. 
The chair of the Young Shell Rijswijk committee is the primary focal point for any stakeholders regarding Young Shell-Rijswijk matters. Primary responsibilities involved are: 
Chair meetings of Young Shell Rijswijk Social committee (Bi-weekly)
Support your committee members 
Maintain professionalism and reputation of Young Shell in and outside of Shell
Vision, and plan of social activities and major flagship events (Joint monthly drinks with Young Shell The Hague, other non-alcoholic activities) 
Budget planning (with treasurer of YSR): discuss budget with sponsor and communicate to team
Provide support to committee members and interact with other committees
Plan budget for events, generate ideas for 
Amongst other activites I was also responsible for participating and subsequently leading a team to frame and organise the Young Shell Rijswijk Pubquiz  where I was the quizmaster leading the event 3 years in a row.
'}, {'date': {'start': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}, 'end': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}}, 'role': 'Salsa Instructor', 'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'Shell', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D0BAQGN30g7aSl4NA/company-logo_400_400/0/1519856218579?e=1700092800&v=beta&t=HqIwwLBNmVKkXXiXnFVRbQwTX34PBz5TB2QZhtR3btU', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/shell/'}, 'cause': 'SCIENCE_AND_TECHNOLOGY', 'description': "Weekly Salsa lessons for Projects and Technology Rijswijk staff after work. I was involved in planning of the lessons and their execution. In collaboration with the Shell Health Rijswijk and Shell Health Promotion Center staff and working together with 2 other salsa instructors at P&T Rijswijk we promoted and executed the lessons by creating a fun and vibrant atmosphere, enthusiastically recruited participants and kept the interest growing by systematically increasing the difficulty level of the dance routine. Each lesson block  was broken up into beginner and intermediate part which focused on specific dance moves, tailored to the level and needs of the group and individuals. 
My responsibilities were to organise  group dinners and events to ensure team building, a pleasant environment and reinforce network among all participants. Additionally I supported the participants by reassuring them and helping them to develop their dance technique and musicality. As the leader of the lesson, my key role was to maintain discipline and keeping the audience's attention whilst teaching different levels and variation of dance moves at a comfortable pace for the group. I created my own way to break down the lesson content in a step-by-step sequence in simple and fun terms for ease of understanding and tailored and adapted according to participant's level and progress."}]
